video.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates
video.synopsis: This animated spinoff of Disney's beloved Peter Pan features young Jake and his friends sailing for treasure in Never Land on their flagship, Bucky.

episodes.synopsis: When Captain Hook tries to find Jake's hideout, Jake sets out to protect his home.
episodes.title: Hide the Hideout! / The Old Shell Game

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew find Captain Hook's hat washed up on shore and set out to return it to him.
episodes.title: Hats Off to Hook! / Escape From Belch Mountain

episodes.synopsis: When Captain Hook takes off with Jake's skateboard, Jake and his crew go after him.
episodes.title: Off the Hook / Never Say Never

episodes.synopsis: When Captain Hook spies a load of snacks that Cubby has prepared, the sneaky pirate swipes the food.
episodes.title: Yo Ho, Food to Go / Basketballs Aweigh!

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew fly kites, making a windy day fun!
episodes.title: The Sky's the Limit! / Bucky Makes a Splash

episodes.synopsis: Jake, Izzy and Cubby throw a "Happy Bird-day Birthday" party for Skully.
episodes.title: Happy Hook Day! / No Returns!

episodes.synopsis: Mistaking Izzy's puzzle box for a tiny treasure chest, Captain Hook swipes the box.
episodes.title: Izzy's Pirate Puzzle / The Never Land Games

episodes.synopsis: Captain Hook decides to swipe the bicycle that Jake, Izzy and Cubby are riding.
episodes.title: Free Wheeling Fun / The Race to Never Peak!

episodes.synopsis: Cubby discovers a clue to sunken treasure.
episodes.title: Cubby's Sunken Treasure / Cubby's Goldfish

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew get surfing tips from their friend, Marina the mermaid!
episodes.title: Surfin' Turf / The Seahorse Roundup

episodes.synopsis: Captain Hook mistakes Cubby's map to the kids' favorite picnic spot for a treasure map.
episodes.title: It's a Pirate Picnic! / The Key to Skull Rock

episodes.synopsis: The kids are really excited to see a rare flower that only blooms every 100 years.
episodes.title: The Never Bloom! / Jake's Starfish Search

episodes.synopsis: Someone has stolen treasure from both Jake's crew and Hook's crew!
episodes.title: Hook Seals a Deal! / The Emerald Coconut

episodes.synopsis: Captain Hook steals a lantern with Jake's friend Brightly the firefly in it.
episodes.title: The Golden Twilight Treasure! / Rock the Croc!

episodes.synopsis: Hook and Smee hide inside a wooden elephant presented to Jake's crew as a gift.
episodes.title: The Elephant Surprise! / Jake's Jungle Groove

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his mates must retrieve a golden egg from Captain Hook to find out who it belongs to.
episodes.title: The Golden Egg / Huddle Up!

episodes.synopsis: Coral Cove is threatened when Captain Hook decides to look for sunken treasure.
episodes.title: Save the Coral Cove! / Treasure Chest Switcheroo

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew fly to Skybird Island to help Skully's bird-friend search for treasure.
episodes.title: Birds of a Feather / Treasure Show and Tell!

episodes.synopsis: Izzy and the crew rescue a princess.
episodes.title: The Pirate Princess / The Rainbow Wand

episodes.synopsis: Hook and Smee stumble upon concealed treasure.
episodes.title: The Sword and the Stone / Jake's Home Run

episodes.synopsis: Hook wants a loyal bird so he captures Skully!
episodes.title: Captain Hook's Parrot / Skybird Island is Falling

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew set off for the Pirate Pumpkin Patch to find the Golden Pumpkin.
episodes.title: Night of the Golden Pirate Pumpkin / Trick or Treasure!

episodes.synopsis: Jake's puppy runs off with one of Hook's boots.
episodes.title: The Pirate Pup! / Pirate Rock!!

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew wake up to find that Peter Pan visited and left presents on the beach!
episodes.title: It's a Winter Never Land / Hook on Ice

episodes.synopsis: Peter asks Jake, Izzy, Cubby and Skully to help him find his missing Shadow.
episodes.title: Peter Pan Returns!: Part 1 / Peter Pan Returns!: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Captain Hook has hidden Peter Pan's Shadow in the Valley of Shadows!
episodes.title: Peter Pan Returns!: Part 3 / Peter Pan Returns: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Jake gives Bucky a shiny golden anchor, which Captain Hook promptly steals. Later, he helps the Pirate Princess recharge her rainbow wand.
episodes.title: Bucky's Anchor Away! / The Never Rainbow

episodes.synopsis: When Peter Pan leaves Jake his musical pipes, he uses it to find a treasure. Later, the crew follows the Never Night Star to the Lost City of Gold.
episodes.title: Peter's Musical Pipes / The Never Night Star

episodes.synopsis: Sharky and Bones accidentally hand off eight of Captain Hook's hooks to a playful octopus. Later, Hook takes care of Mr. Smee's pet chameleon.
episodes.title: Captain Hook's Hooks/Mr. Smee's Pet

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his pirate team travel to the desert to help Captain Flynn find his ship, the Barracuda.
episodes.title: Pirates of the Desert / The Great Pirate Pyramid

episodes.synopsis: Captain Hook's mother comes to visit. Later on, it's Pixie Dust Away Day, and an excited Izzy accidentally loses all her pixie dust.
episodes.title: Mama Hook Knows Best! / Pixie Dust Away!

episodes.synopsis: Captain Hook joins a downhill race to Race-Around Rock. Later, when Hook goes missing, Jake and the crew try to track him down.
episodes.title: Race-Around Rock! / Captain Hook is Missing

episodes.synopsis: Hook chases the Sing-Songbird to snatch one of its feathers for his hat. Izzy plays doctor to help a sick whale who swallowed a treasure chest.
episodes.title: A Feather in Hook's Hat / A Whale of a Tale

episodes.synopsis: Hook visits the Pirates' Plunge to have some fun. Bucky reveals a hidden talent for turning into a submarine.
episodes.title: Captain Hook's Lagoon / Undersea Bucky!

episodes.synopsis: Marina's sister puts Captain Hook, Mr. Smee and Cubby under the spell of the Mermaid's Song. Izzy gets a surprise during the Treasure of the Tides.
episodes.title: The Mermaid's Song / Treasure of the Tides

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew head to Big Bug Valley to find the legendary Golden Caterpillar. Captain Hook poses as a queen to lure two princess to his lair.
episodes.title: B-B-Big Bug Valley! / The Queen of Never Land

episodes.synopsis: Red Jessica asks Captain Hook to watch her kitty for the day. Later on, Hook tries to tag along on Jake's camping trip to Doubloon Lagoon.
episodes.title: Hook and the Itty-Bitty Kitty / Pirate Campout

episodes.synopsis: Izzy helps the Mermaids find the Trident of Truth. Captain Hook tries to crash the gang's game of Pirate Putt-Putt.
episodes.title: Izzy's Trident Treasure / Pirate Putt-Putt

episodes.synopsis: According to the Pirate Code, Bucky has to race the Jolly Roger. If he loses, Hook will own him!
episodes.title: Jake Saves Bucky: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: According to the Pirate Code, Bucky has to race the Jolly Roger. If he loses, Hook will own him!
episodes.title: Jake Saves Bucky: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: Captain Hook joins Jake and his crew as they "trick or treasure" across Never Land.
episodes.title: Tricks, Treats and Treasure! / Season of the Sea Witch

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Captain Hook are on the hunt for ingredients for a Thanksgiving-styled feast. Captain Flynn needs Cubby's help to read a treasure map.
episodes.title: Cookin' with Hook! / Captain Flynn's New Matey

episodes.synopsis: When Jake finds a parrot-sized shipwreck, he and his mates fix it up for Skully to sail.
episodes.title: Sail Away Treasure / The Mystery of Mysterious Island!

episodes.synopsis: Bucky is covered in barnacles, and the only way to get rid of them is to find the Zebra Rose. Cubby sets out to return a sea serpent to his mother.
episodes.title: A Bad Case of the Barnacles! / Cubby's Pet Problem

episodes.synopsis: A frustrated Captain Hook invents an all-in-one "Swiss Army" hook. Later on, he finds himself chained to Jake.
episodes.title: Hook's Hookity-Hook!/Hooked Together!

episodes.synopsis: Cubby leads his mateys to the Golden Dinghy, but Hook hatches a plan to reach the treasure first. Later, Jake helps a penguin find a chilly paradise.
episodes.title: Cubby's Mixed-Up Map!/ Jake's Cool New Matey

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his mates help Hook retrieve a precious gemstone for Red Jessica. Later on, they teach him how to dance.
episodes.title: Hooked / The Never Land Pirates Ball

episodes.synopsis: On Jake's birthday, his mates give him a treasures map to different birthday festivities. Hook steals the lighthouse diamond.
episodes.title: Jake's Birthday Bash! / The Lighthouse Diamond

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew get an invitation to the Tiki Tree Luau. After smelling Forget-Me Flowers, Captain Hook begins to forget who he is.
episodes.title: Tiki Tree Luau/ Captain Who?

episodes.synopsis: When the Jolly Roger begins to sink, Captain Hook puts Mr. Smee in charge. Later on, Bones worries he turned Captain Hook into a frog.
episodes.title: Ahoy, Captain Smee! / Cap'n Croak

episodes.synopsis: The kids join Hook and his crew on a hunt for an elusive pirate thief who stole Jake's sword -- and Hook's hook! Later, Bones and Cubby trade places.
episodes.title: The Mystery Pirate/ Pirate Swap!

episodes.synopsis: A pirate with particularly sticky fingers manages to swipe the Jolly Roger, Sharky and Bones's instruments -- and Captain Hook's hat!
episodes.title: Jake and Sneaky LeBeak / Cubby The Brave!

episodes.synopsis: When Jake picks up a ship in a bottle, he releases a magical pirate who makes wishes come true.
episodes.title: Pirate Genie-In-A Bottle!

episodes.synopsis: Hook is determined to save Red Jessica from her duplicitous new pirate pal. Cubby loses his prized marble but finds a map to a mythical treasure.
episodes.title: Pirate Pals!/ Treasurefalls!

episodes.synopsis: Hook accidentally spritzes a withered plant with cologne, causing it to grow larger and larger. Patch digs up a statue that looks just like Mr. Smee.
episodes.title: Hook's Playful Plant!/ The Golden Smee!

episodes.synopsis: Cubby jumps at the chance to become a Sand Pirate when Captain Flynn holds open auditions. Later on, Captain Hook tries to sneak into Flynn's pyramid.
episodes.title: Sand Pirate Cubby! / Song of the Desert

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew decide to deliver a package that washes up on the shores of Never Land. Later, he and the gang ride in Marina's seahorse race.
episodes.title: Jake's Special Delivery!/ Seahorse Saddle-Up!

episodes.synopsis: Jake and the crew climb a giant beanstalk and come across a crocodile that lays golden eggs. Captain Hook tries to steal a basket of goodies.
episodes.title: Jake and the Beanstalk / Little Red Riding Hook!

episodes.synopsis: Jake and his crew enter the Bumbles' Bungalow to stop another of Hook's schemes. But can they save Sandy the Starfish and his singing clams?
episodes.title: Follow the Bouncing Bumble!/ Sandy and the Clams

episodes.synopsis: When Never Land is in trouble, Jake gets help from a guardian and a mysterious guiding light!
episodes.title: Jake's Never Land Rescue: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Jake must complete the Forever Quest to save Never Land!
episodes.title: Jake's Never Land Rescue: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: When Misty turns into an evil sea witch, Jake and his mateys help her transform back. Feeling lucky, Bones sets out on a treasure hunt.
episodes.title: Misty's Magical Mix-Up! / Bone's Lucky Doubloon

episodes.synopsis: When Queen Coralie, the mermaid ruler of Neptune City, is "hooked" by Captain Hook, Jake sets out to rescue her.
episodes.title: Jake's Royal Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's excited to play in the snow during a Never Land blizzard. Later on, Jake and Hook join forces to exterminate a skunk bug.
episodes.title: F-f-frozen Never Land! / Little Stinkers
